tp:treatment-sec.p: – Flagellum like a short protrusion, ovate or elongate ovate ............................................................... 3
– Flagellum ovate or elongate ovate; inner sculpture of flagellum with longitudinal pilasters ........... 4

4. Vagina shorter than free oviduct; inner penis without verge ................................
L. elegans
sp. nov.
– Vagina as long or longer than free oviduct; inner penis with verge ................................................. 5

6. Inner wall of penis with wavy, corrugated slender longitudinal pilasters; short, hollow verge ......... .........................................................................................................................
L . tuberculata
sp. nov.

– Inner wall of penis with stout, longitudinal, zigzag, pilasters; short, rounded verge ......................... ...............................................................................
L. diplogramma ( Möllendorff, 1902 )
comb. nov.
